revised_title: Palaeomastodon Skull and Dentition: Insights into Tooth Change in Proboscidea
tldr: The author examines the skull, mandible, and milk dentition of Palaeomastodon, a prehistoric elephant-like creature, and provides insights into the tooth change in the Proboscidea family. The study reveals the structure of the skull and dentition, as well as the changes in the tusks and teeth throughout the creature's life. This research contributes to our understanding of the evolution and development of the Proboscidea family.
